student_announcement_items.title: Spring 2025 Registration Now Open
student_announcement_items.body_html: Register for spring semester classes now. Advisors are available to help you plan your schedule and ensure you're on track for graduation.

student_announcement_items.title: Final Exam Schedule Available
student_announcement_items.body_html: Check your final exam schedule in Self Service. Remember that final exams are worth a significant portion of your grade.

student_announcement_items.title: Winter Break Campus Hours
student_announcement_items.body_html: Campus services will operate on reduced hours during winter break. Check the academic calendar for specific dates and times.

support_center_cards.title: Academic Advising
support_center_cards.body_html: Talk to an advisor about your academic goals, course selection, and any concerns you have with your classes.

support_center_cards.title: Tutoring Services
support_center_cards.body_html: Work with a tutor for help with your studies. Tutoring services are free and available online or in-person.

support_center_cards.title: Career Services
support_center_cards.body_html: Get help with resume building, job searches, and career planning to prepare for your future.

support_center_cards.title: Financial Aid
support_center_cards.body_html: Get assistance with FAFSA applications, scholarships, and understanding your financial aid options.

support_center_cards.title: Disability Services
support_center_cards.body_html: Access accommodations and support services to help you succeed in your academic journey.

support_center_cards.title: Library Services
support_center_cards.body_html: Access research resources, study spaces, and librarian assistance for your academic projects.

on_campus_resources.title: On-Campus Resources
on_campus_resources.intro_html: Explore what's available on campus from the parking lot to the bookstore. Take a break in one of our student lounges. Use the tech in our computer labs. Or find a quiet area in the library to study.

academic_contact_section.title: Academic Support Contacts
academic_contact_section.intro: Find the contact information you need for academic departments and support services.

student_support_items.title: Tutoring Center
student_support_items.body: Get free tutoring in math, writing, science, and more. Both online and in-person options available.

student_support_items.title: Academic Advising
student_support_items.body: Meet with an advisor to plan your course schedule and stay on track for graduation.

student_support_items.title: Financial Aid Office
student_support_items.body: Get help with FAFSA, scholarships, payment plans, and understanding your financial aid package.

student_support_items.title: Student Life
student_support_items.body: Join clubs, attend events, and connect with other students. Make the most of your college experience.

student_support_items.title: Accessibility Services
student_support_items.body: Get accommodations and support services if you have a documented disability.

student_support_items.title: Mental Health & Counseling
student_support_items.body: Access confidential counseling services and mental health resources on campus.
